[alias]
auth = BaseSpaceCLI.tools.authenticate:Authenticate

[builtin]
launch app = BaseSpaceCLI.tools.oneAppLaunch:OneAppLaunch
authenticate = BaseSpaceCLI.tools.authenticate:Authenticate
create project = BaseSpaceCLI.tools.createProject:CreateProject
kill appsession = BaseSpaceCLI.tools.abortAppsession:AbortAppsession
list = BaseSpaceCLI.tools.listEntities:ListEntities
register = BaseSpaceCLI.tools.registry:Register
import app = BaseSpaceCLI.tools.addNewTemplate:AddNewTemplate
unregister = BaseSpaceCLI.tools.registry:Unregister
wait = BaseSpaceCLI.tools.wait:Wait
whoami = BaseSpaceCLI.tools.whoami:WhoAmI
upload sample = BaseSpaceCLI.tools.sampleUpload:SampleUpload
history = BaseSpaceCLI.tools.history:History

[console_scripts]
bs = BaseSpaceCLI.main:main

[discoverable]
mount = BaseSpaceCLI.tools.external:Mount [basemount]
cp = BaseSpaceCLI.tools.external:Copy [bscp]
unmount = BaseSpaceCLI.tools.external:Unmount [basemount]
